1.content:
Which of these jocks is going to fatten up?

Brad "The Eyecandy"
Football
6'5
245lbs, mostly muscle

Jon "The Beast"
Football
6'4
330lbs, mostly fat

Ryan "The Party Animal"
Baseball
6'0
180lbs, mostly muscle

Erik "The Giant"
Basketball
6'6
225lbs, mostly muscle
1.title: Which Guy?

info.brief_description: When bulking is taken to the next level
info.description:
Thanks for reading Jock Weight Gain Story!
-
Just a few rules:
No magic
No vore
No death
No female weight gain
Please try to stick to realisitic weight gain
Sex is fine
Any male character can gain alongside the main characters.
-
Please add stories! Thanks!
